FuncDef:
The traffic-separate enable command enables DAA service separation.
The undo traffic-separate enable command disables DAA service separation.
By default, DAA service separation is disabled in the service policy view.
ExtraInfo:
Usage Scenario
To enable DAA service separation in a DAA service policy, run the traffic-separate enable command. After DAA service separation is enabled, service traffic of DAA users using this service policy is not counted into user traffic, and the bandwidth of service traffic is not restricted by user bandwidth.
Precautions
This command is supported only on the admin VS.
The traffic-separate enable and undo traffic-separate enable commands can be run only in a DAA service policy.
